name: Kadina Bed & Breakfast

reviews.text: We had a weekend in Norfolk doing a great variety of things including seeing old school pals and family. Alison at Kadina gave a wonderful base. So very peaceful, great room and exceptional hospitality to say nothing about the great variety of the breakfast options. We strongly recommend Kadina.
reviews.title: A wonderful place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wow Allison - we were impressed. Think you can't have your cake and eat it? You CAN at Kadina! From when you arrive with a cup of tea, and if you are lucky like we were, some more to set you on your way home. For those budding B&B proprietors to indeed, the most experienced, you should all take a trip to High Kelling and receive a masterclass from Allison. Spotlessly kept accommodation with the best power shower you could imagine in the 1st floor en-suite. Leisurely tailor-made breakfasts at the big table were a joy! It has all been said before and we sincerely agree with every word printed. We look forward to our next stay. John&Julia
reviews.title: Can have your cake and eat it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Clean, spacious, comfortable, delicious food. We stayed 5 nights and had an evening meal each day. Food excellent. Wide choice for breakfast and superb evening meals, all freshly cooked with lovely home made sauces. The chocolate sponge pudding was a chocaholic's dream. Allison is a great hostess as well as fantastic cook. Nothing too much trouble. Room was spotless with lots of extras, even emery boards! Proper towels to wrap round you after using the power shower or corner bath. Allison is very knowledgeable regarding the surrounding area for places of interest and where to find places to eat, but why would you want to eat anywhere else? We will be returning. Peter and Eileen
reviews.title: Best B&B we have ever stayed at

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is our 2nd stay at Kadina. It is spotlessly clean, the host Allison is wonderful nothing is too much trouble. She goes out of her way to cook a fantastic breakfast of your choice. She is very knowledgable of the area and will recommended places to visit and restaurants to eat at. It is an outstanding bed and breakfast.
reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The owner Allison cannot do enough to make your stay as pleasant as possible.
reviews.title: Have never stayed in a better B & B, it's perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just had another lovely long weekend visit to Kadina B&B. We have returned many times as we feel it is a fantastic place to stay. It is in a very good location for exploring Holt and the beautiful North Norfolk coastline. Kadina is situated next to Kelling Heath where you can watch the rabbits and wildlife from the upstairs bedroom. There is ample parking to the front of the property.
reviews.title: "Excellent" B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: From the moment you arrive Allison, Trevor and Ruby make you very welcome, nothing is too much trouble and Allison goes out of her way to help with advice and knowledge on the area. The whole B&B is spotlessly clean, beautifully decorated with lots of attention to detail. Allison is a wonderful cook and leaves you very yummy cakes and cookies in your bedroom, a great variety and chioce for breakfast to set you up for the day and we would highly recommend you stay in for dinner in the evening (Allison arranges the menu with you and the meals are delicious).
reviews.title: Lovely comfortable stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall Kadina B&B deserves the "excellent" rating we and other travellers have given it and anyone looking for a B&B in this part of Norfolk would not find a better place to stay.
reviews.title: great place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We definately look foreward to many more weedends with Allison, Trevor and Ruby!!
reviews.title: Returning again and again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great b&b, attention to detail really good. Allison is an excellent host, and cook! Breakfasts are fabulous. Room comfortable, clean, and location great for exploring North Norfolk. Holt close by and great for evenings out. Deserves its excellent reviews.
reviews.title: Wonderful welcome, just like going home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned from a wonderful stay at 'Kadina' where Allison is the perfect host. This is the best Bed and Breakfast accommodation we have ever stayed in. The room on the 1st Floor was beautiful and spacious. The cakes on arrival were a welcome addition after a dreadful journey in the rain. The breakfast and the selection offered, really set you up for the day. We will be going back, again and again! Paul & Karen
reviews.title: Perfection

reviews.text: We went to stay here recommended by friends who used to run there own B+ B in Holt with my elderly parents. It was like staying with friends we will be back to stay.
reviews.title: Just like staying with friends

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is the second time we have stayed at the Kadina B&B near Holt. This time we went for a mid-winter weekend break. Alison was very friendly and welcoming as always and this time we had the slightly larger room upstairs with the bath and larger bathroom. Both rooms are good, but the added bath and extra space upstairs is worth it. The breakfasts are fantastic, probably one of the best we've ever had at a B&B! Allround a great place to stay within a short drive of Holt, Sheringham and some great beaches - We'll be back!
reviews.title: A wonderful B&B - Highly recommended!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is simply outstanding Bed and Breakfast accommodation. There was a lovely warm welcome from Allison and Trevor and this top level of hospitality continued throughout our three days. The facilities are top class. Allison is a first rate cook and the breakfast and evening meals she prepared were delicious, not to mention the little extras like home made cakes and biscuits. We hope to return in the not too distant future. Jim & Jean
reviews.title: An all round winner !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had a great stay at Kadina, the room we had was really well appointed, with plenty of space to move around. A great shower again with loads of room. Alison's homemade cookies in biscuit tin went down a treat. Breakfast was enough to keep us going all day, and we had a great selection of fruit to choose from. We had evening meals in, who needed to go out for meals when the standard of cooking was so good. I have already recommended her to our friends.
reviews.title: The AA were wrong, it's not 4 star, its 7 star.
Faultless B&B
reviews.text: It is difficult to find anything new to say, but I have to reiterate what has been said many times before. This is a superb place to stay in the north Norfolk area for a few days. The welcome is warm and Allison can't do enough to make you feel at home with lovely home cooking. The breakfast is ordered the previous night with a generous choice including pancakes, haddock and home made natural yoghurt as well as all the usual fry-up favourites. We had the first floor room and it was warm and comfortable on a bitterly cold weekend. The en suite is very well appointed with a great power shower. There was powerful wifi which made a pleasant change, but don't expect much of a mobile phone signal. I cannot fault this establishment unless you hoped to walk into Holt which is a couple of miles away.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Of course, there are now more than a few excellent B&Bs in the UK, but some are quite smug about it. There is no such pretentiousness here. It is like staying in a warm, cosy and luxurious farmhouse - albeit a quality modern variety. You would never guess such a lovely place like this was tucked away in the outskirts of Holt - but it definitely is THE place to stay if you like walking and the outdoors. No wearing of shoes upstairs either, which I think is a very good policy. From the moment you step into your room you get the feeling that the holiday has begun - even if it is only a weekend! That's because the furnishings and fittings are well-designed and there are fresh flowers in the room. I loved the lace tray cloths and the view (from the small window) over garden and heathland. Kadina is perfectly placed for walks on the Kelling Heath SSSI and if you are a bit of a train spotter, on your outing you will love seeing locomotive smoke through the trees - you are very near the heritage (but daily timetabled) train line to Sheringham. Have I mentioned the cooking? We were welcomed in the afternoon by a cream tea (no less) and despatched with some delicious home-baked fruit cake for our train journey home. In between, had the best ever three course breakfasts to order. I recommend highly - you would not get anything like this in a hotel.
reviews.title: A treasure of a place - surely one of the UK's best

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is such a brilliant place if you want peace (so quiet at night) and tranquility - especially if you really want to be allowed to relax and unwind. It is OK too if you are non-driver. You'll probably be arriving by taxi, but if you just ask, you can get details of the bus timetable and can pick up the reliable Coast Hopper if you want to go further afield along the coast. However, I believe that coastal Salthouse is walkable from the B&B and then you are not far from Cley. Thanks to Allison and Trevor and Ruby (a charming and intelligent terrier) for having us in their home. We'll be back as soon as we can possibly manage it.
reviews.title: High Quality B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Me and my wife stayed on a cold wet weekend in March 2013. Lovley warm cosy B&B, more like home than hotel. Our damp coats were taken away for drying and fresh cups of tea were provided in a cosy kitchen. The owner made us very welcome. Our room was spacious, very clean and comfortable. Bedroom and bathroom were finished to a high standard and small home made cakes in a tin with the tea making tray was a nice touch. Good nights sleep in a very cosy bed and next morning an excellent breakfast with lots of choice. Good location for exploring North Norfolk. I will go back again. (Sat Navs may not tell you to turn up the gravel track by the red bin on Bridge Rd).
reviews.title: High Class in High Kelling

reviews.text: Kadina is the best B&B in Norfolk. A bold statement perhaps but one I think you'll agree with when you stay there. Allison is just amazing and nothing is too much trouble for her. The standard throughout the B&B is absolutely top-class with lots of nice homely touches in the rooms, which are clean, modern and well kept. The breakfast selection is wonderful and varied, with everything from fruit to Full English! From the minute we arrived we felt relaxed and comfortable and quickly settled in to a perfect week's holiday. A slice of home-made cake and a cup of tea on arrival were very welcome after a long journey! Nice touch. Kadina is situated in a peaceful location but within easy reach of the lovely Georgian town of Holt. It's a perfect base for exploring all the diverse beauty that North Norfolk has to offer. Allison's excellent local knowledge is also invaluable when planning trips out around the area. We were sad to leave after a wonderful week but came home with many happy memories of a great holiday break. Kadina is a fabulous, well-run B&B that fully deserves all its excellent reviews on this site. We have already booked to come back for a week again next year and I absolutely can't wait!
reviews.title: A great homely B&B

description: Kadina is situated in the peaceful, wooded village of High Kelling, one and a half miles from Holt. Relax, unwind and enjoy tea and afternoon cake on arrival, a good nights sleep and a hearty breakfast which will set you up to explore beautiful north Norfolk.
